body_en: Before the invasion, the media talked about the impossibility of [disconnecting](https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2022/03/07/swift-sanctions-russia-ukraine-banking/) Russian banks from the international Swift system, as it was disadvantageous to the West. When the disconnection occurred because of sanctions, its damage in the media is levelled, and the topic is covered only rarely.
